page.title: 14Where we go to school
page.content: The Village school at Hyssington {closed in 1969}since then primary school children attend Churchstoke School. However some children in the North- East of the parish attend Hope School in Shropshire. Pupils are conveyed to both schools by taxi supplied by Powys County Council. Secondary pupils attend either {Welshpool High School}or{Bishops {Castle High School. In 1985, 8 pupils from the Hyssing- ton area attended Welshpool leaving by bus at 8am and returning at 4-30pm. Five pupils also attended Bishops Castle.
